text: It ain't often that a man's reputation outlasts his money.
author: Josh Billings

text: Money will buy a pretty good dog, but it won't buy the wag of his tail.
author: Josh Billings

text: Don't cling to fame. You're just borrowing it. It's like money. You're going to die, and somebody else is going to get it.
author: Sonny Bono

text: You shouldn't have to have money to have a luxury fragrance.
author: Lady Gaga

text: A group or an artist shouldn't get his money until his boss gets his.
author: Bobby Darin
